description: This is a server entry point for a Remix.js web application, handling HTTP requests and streaming server-rendered React components with support for bot detection and CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, detects if the request is from a bot, and delegates to either handleBotRequest or handleBrowserRequest.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming HTML content via React's renderToPipeableStream.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming HTML content via React's renderToPipeableStream.
